correspondence.message: The first lectures are approaching and in the third semester I have to choose an applied subject. Will there be an information session for third semester students on this topic? I need more information on the goals of the applied subjects and the credit distribution in order to make an informed choice."

There will be no information event on the application subjects. The structure of the respective application subjects can be found on the website. If you have any specific questions, please feel free to contact us.
